description:
A young Luffy who has been dreaming about getting out of Windmill Village one day to accomplish something great meets a young girl named Uta who came along with Shanks and the Red-Hair Pirates calling herself the musician of the pirate group. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Faint Memory! Luffy and Red-Haired`s Daughter Uta!
Eiga Rendou Episode: Awai Kioku - Luffy to Akagami no Musume Uta
Flüchtige Erinnerungen – Ruffy und die Tochter von Rothaar, Uta
Vagues souvenirs. Luffy et Uta, la fille du Roux !
Смутное воспоминание! Луффи и дочь Красноволосого Ута!
映画連動エピソード 淡い記憶 ルフィと赤髪の娘ウタ
